name: mcap-to-lerobot
description: Convert MCAP file(s) to a LeRobot Dataset

parameters.name: alignment_topic
parameters.description: ROS topic to use as the base timeline for frame alignment. Valid options: '/joint_states', '/arm_controller/joint_trajectory', '/face_downward/zed/left/image_rect_color/compressed', '/face_upward/zed/left/image_rect_color/compressed'. All other signals will be backward-merged onto this base timeline.
